2.caption_en:
A concentric circular ecosystem-mapping template centered on a "HUMAN" core, with labeled rings for "NEEDS" and prompt areas, radial sectors, and teal-highlighted segments denoting core and complementary areas. The diagram includes labeled sector roles (Enablers, Realizers, Orchestrators) and a list of example ecosystem types at the lower-left.

{
  "title": "Ecosystem Mapping Template",
  "type": "diagram_template",
  "layout": "concentric_circles_with_radial_sectors",
  "image_dimensions": {
    "width_px": 1024,
    "height_px": 1024
  },
  "color_scheme": {
    "accent": "teal",
    "background_rings": "light_gray",
    "center": "white",
    "outlines": "dark_gray"
  },
  "central_element": {
    "label": "HUMAN",
    "description": "Core subject of the ecosystem map",
    "color": "white"
  },
  "rings": {
    "count": 4,
    "labels": [
      "HUMAN (center)",
      "NEEDS (inner teal ring surrounding center)",
      "Prompt/analysis rings (three concentric pale-gray rings for mapping details)",
      "Outer border ring (teal band indicating CORE AREAS and COMPLEMENTARY AREAS)"
    ]
  },
  "radial_structure": {
    "sector_count": 8,
    "sector_labels_visible": [
      "ENABLERS",
      "REALIZERS",
      "ORCHESTRATORS"
    ],
    "highlighted_wedge": {
      "connects": "center to outer ring",
      "color": "teal"
    }
  },
  "edge_labels": {
    "core_areas": "CORE AREAS (top-left along outer band)",
    "complementary_areas": "COMPLEMENTARY AREAS (bottom-right along outer band)"
  },
  "embedded_text_prompts": [
    "What is the primary need of the human in this ecosystem segment?",
    "What is your own platform in this segment? Who are the other key players?",
    "What are your own products/services or assets in this segment?",
    "Who are the other key providers or products in this segment?",
    "What are your own resources, partners, or behaviors that enable the segment?"
  ],
  "examples_of_ecosystems_listed": [
    "Health",
    "Recreation",
    "Education",
    "Work",
    "Entertainment",
    "Socialization",
    "Living",
    "Mobility",
    "Spirituality",
    "Shopping",
    "Food"
  ],
  "visual_features": [
    "concentric circles",
    "radial grid lines dividing the circle into sectors",
    "teal accent bands for emphasis",
    "thin dark-gray outlines",
    "small instructional/prompt text in inner rings",
    "examples list in lower-left corner"
  ]
}
